name: The OoC Weeds
description:
You play as the little witch Flora, who is in love with her rose bush! One day the weeds in her garden go out of control. It's up to YOU to save her lovely bush, by watering it and defeating the thirsty weed monsters who wills it ill in this Bullet Hell Garden Experience that will not leave you dry!

Made during GMTK Jam 2020 by: 

Alexander Brierly Chramer -  Programming/Game design

Linda Hakanen - Character design / 3D art

Felicia Kyrling - 3D art/ UI

Fabian Hugert -  Programming/Game design
